chapters.title: Chapter 18:  A Chat With Siuan
chapters.info: Malind Nachenin, p. 452 (546)—Plump Sitter for the Green Ajah among the rebel Aes Sedai. She has a round, pretty face with full lips and dark, fierce eyes like those of an eagle. She is from Kandor. She was raised after the sisters banded together in Salidar. She once proposed an “appeal” (i.e., demand) to area nobles for assistance in building their army.
